description:
μ`s completes their first concert in an empty auditorium. However, the three members promise to someday sing in front of a massive crowd. In order to do this, they must increase their number of members to five and be recognized by the student council as a club. Honoka immediately attempts to recruit first year student Hanayo, who runs away from her. However, Hanayo actually wishes to become an idol. Even though her friend Rin encourages her to do it, she continues to worry and can`t make up her mind.
That`s when she happens upon Maki as she takes a recruitment flier...
Source: crunchyroll
